Those awful {@LinkCreature:34#1010#icereaver giants} attacked a mining team and stalked off with their eldritch shards.

I don't know what the giants would do with shards, but we want them back.

The shards, of course. The giants, not so much.

With this shipment of shards safely returned, we can get this shipment out and pay for resupply.

Aren't the giants just awful? Hard to imagine the civilized baraka are even remotely related.

Well, thanks!
Oh, they're around. Scour the Howling Glacier and the Screaming Snowfield.
